contents.heading: About Other person
descriptions: I really like determined, ambitious women who have high self esteem
A person having their way with words and always talking positive
You reply to almost every chat of mine! which is really great for my obsession.

contents.heading: About Me
descriptions: I may look tall and manly, but I am very soft, calm, honest and I almost never lie. I also get angry very less. I do get upset most of the time though... but this will change...
Maybe I am not the prettiest nor gym toned, but I am good in other ways
I like to obey and listen to others. I can withstand many things, can eat everything and can adjust my needs based on other's happiness
I like to stay obsessed with someone and think about them about all the time. Somehow I manage to not think about them during work.
Taking permission is a must I feel. I blame myself a lot if something goes wrong. So I try to keep everything as formal and decent. Until I get used to that person and they start avoiding me.

contents.heading: Some Random shit
descriptions: I have a strong feeling that once I am in a relationship with a girl ... like permanently, I am not going to look at / talk with any other women. And even if i look, i will tell them about the contexts and reasons.
